answer:
At most 2  sugar cookies selected is equivalent to not selecting at least three
sugar cookies. The number of ways to select the 15 cookies with at most two sugar cookies is
the number of ways to select the cookies with no restrictions minus the number of
ways to select the cookies with at least three sugar cookies:
instructions: A cookie store sells 6 varieties of cookies. It has a large supply of each kind.
question:
(c)

How many ways are there to select 15 cookies if at most 2 can be sugar cookies?
